collation.cr: ‎&׳ # 05F3 HEBREW PUNCTUATION GERESH, ignorable <<'' # APOSTROPHE, Hebrew-specific addition, should match GERESH ‎&״ # 05F4 HEBREW PUNCTUATION GERSHAYIM, ignorable <<'\"' # QUOTATION MARK, Hebrew-specific addition, should match GERSHAYIM
&[before 2]''<<׳ # GERESH just before APOSTROPHE (secondary difference) &[before 2]'\"'<<״ # GERSHAYIM just before QUOTATION MARK (secondary difference)
